summary:
Simple war paint textures for female.
HIRAGANA is Japanese syllables.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]LATEST CHANGE[/size]

[size=3]Add HIRAGANA WORDS 1.That archive have あまざらし えふえふ えるたそ～ もののふ(Words).
Add image.
あまざらし meaning Weather-beaten
えふえふ meaning FINALFANTASY(Abbreviation)
えるたそ～ meaning Chitanda Eru(Anime Character) nickname
もののふ meaning samuraia warrior[/size]

[size=6]NEXT CHANGE[/size]

[size=6]DESCRIPTION[/size]

[size=3]Simple war paint textures for female.HIRAGANA is Japanese syllables.
SKYRIM - すかいりむ,Dragonbone - どらごんぼーん,
Resolution is 2K.Archive have reversal textures(Reversal Textures have "a" name).[/size]

[size=6]List[/size]

[size=5]あいうえお
かきくけこ
さしすせそ
たちつてと
なにぬねの
はひふへほ
まみむめも
やゆよ
らりるれろ
わゐゑを
ん[/size]

[size=6]REQUIREMENT MODS[/size]

[size=3]SKSE
////////////////////////////////
Please type SKSE.ini.
[Display]
iTintTextureResolution=2048
///////////////////////////////[/size]
[size=6]HOW TO USE[/size]

[size=3]1.Extraction.
2.Copy to Your Data/textures/actors/character/character assets/tintmasks.
3.Rename to femaleheadwarpaint_01-10.
4.Read.[/size]

[size=6]TWITTER[Japanese][/size]
[size=3][url=https://twitter.com/NFZIP]@NGZIP[/url][/size]

[size=3]Sorry for my poor English.[/size]
